rationale: The segment contains an intensifier ('so') modifying a quantity ('many'), not a risk-adjective.
The segment describes a factual constraint ('not all of them have enough capacity') without high-potency framing.
No moderate verb paired with explicit scale or impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports on a limitation in capacity but contains no explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
